metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4387 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
net/ipv6/ip6_output.c in the Linux kernel through 3.11.4 does not properlydetermine the need for UDP Fragmentation Offload (UFO) processing of smallpackets after the UFO queueing of a large packet, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and system crash)or possibly have unspecified other impact via network traffic that triggersa large response packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4387` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.12.0-1-generic - 3.12.0-1.3
